Question: Following several years of poor health, this person died on the morning of 8 April 2013 at the age of 87 after suffering a stroke.
Hints: As Prime Minister, she implemented policies that have come to be known as this personism.
Polls suggested that fewer than one in three British citizens approved of this person's decision.
During the campaigns, she was supported by her parents and by Denis ****, whom she married in December 1951.
